Detractor Alert
Action Required
Detractor Alert
{!Contact.Name} from {!Account.Name} recently completed the NCR Relationship Survey and is a Detractor. Please follow-up with the contact within 5 days of this notice.
You can click on the Link to access the case. From there you can click on the contact name to view their survey.
DO NOT mention Detractor classification. That is an internal term and should not be discussed with the contact.
HOW TO UPDATE FOLLOW-UP CASE:
CLICK ALERT LINK in the original alert sent to you, or click link in SUBJECT column of report to open a specific case. CLICK CHANGE OWNER BUTTON if necessary to reassign to a different account owner. CLICK CONTACT NAME to open contact record and view survey feedback with all responses. CLICK BACK CLICK BACK in your browser to return to the follow-up case so you can edit and make updates. CLICK EDIT BUTTON in the case to update all required fields including any planned actions. UPDATE STATUS to reflect your follow-up progress: New – (Default) no action has been taken yet. Call Completed – discussion documented in case including key issues and planned actions. Closed – all actions have been completed by sales and functional teams to address the contact’s concerns. CLICK SAVE BUTTON to save all changes when completed.
NOTE: If you are not the Account Manager for this contact, see instructions below to Change Owner and reassign the case.
